alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:23AM EST until February 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze to up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of the southern Adirondacks, the Lake George Saratoga Region, Washington County and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates Wednesday evening may reach 1 inch per hour at times before transitioning to a wintry mix.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
